title: Accomplish a Great Feat
detail_text: <:th_ch0205/>*Sigh*~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>My, it’s rare to see you sigh, Ai.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Ah, Mari~! You see, Ai really wants to accomplish a “great feat” today, but it’s not going so well....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>A great feat!? Do you have something big on your mind!? Wow, Mari would love to be the first person to witness you do it, Ai~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>You’ll support me!? Tha-<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Thank you, Ai! Mari was just looking for something interesting to do~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Aaaaaargh!!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>What!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Gah, someone beat me to it again~~~! Ai wanted to say “Thank you, cause today is 3/9 (san/kyu)”～～～! Ai can’t do that pun any other day~~~! Ai will be faster next time~~~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Eh!? Wait, Ai, I’m sorry! Ai, where are you going~!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Ai shall achieve greatness today!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
